section.title: Description
section.para: Creates a window object that can be used in the make_moving_window_view function. Depending on the overload either a circular or a square window is created. For square windows, the radius is the distance from side to the central pixel.

section.title: Definition
section.para: The tags square_tag and circle_tag are defined in "moving_window/traits.h"

section.title: Example of use
section.para: The following example creates a window object that specifies a circular window with a radius of 5 pixels.
